appbar.step3: Add A Consent Widget To Your Website
appbar.allStepsCompTxt1: Congratulations! All the steps to set up the app were successfully done!
appbar.allStepsCompTxt2: Now, go to one of your product pages and add an item to the cart in order to see the Facebook Subscribe popup!

abandonedCarts.headerInfo: The List displays all the Abandoned Carts your Wix Store had after installing Facebook Cart Recovery, regardless of whether they subscribed or not to receive notifications from Facebook.
abandonedCarts.custRangeInfo: Select a start date and an end date to see the data for that specific period.
abandonedCarts.noDataTxt: You currently have no abandoned carts. Please note that we only track the abandoned carts from the moment you installed the app.

dashboard.infoMsg: The Dashboard shows performance statistics of the Facebook Cart Recovery app within a selected time range.

card1.infoconMsg: How many times each Facebook message type - Cart Recovery, Receipt or Shipped - was sent within the selected time period.

card2.infoconMsg: The metrics displayed are how many carts were recovered in total, what’s the recovery percentage and how many carts were abandoned. Please note that a cart is considered recovered when the user pays for the previously abandoned order.

card3.infoconMsg: The metrics displayed are the total number of revenue recovered, what’s the revenue recovery percentage and how much was lost.

card4.infoconMsg: The daily metrics displayed on the charts represent: The number of Abandoned Carts (red), the number of Recovered Carts (green), the Revenue Recovered (blue).

campaigns.modalText1: This is how your Facebook messages will look like when they are sent to the user
campaigns.modalText2: Please note that this interface is for showcasing purposes and it's not clickable.

infocons.msg1: Send customers that abandon a shop order Facebook messages to remind them of their lost order. The customers have to consent in order to be contacted via Facebook and you can send them a maximum of 2 messages within 24 hours. You can consider adding a discount code to the messages and increase the sale conversion rate.
infocons.msg2: First Facebook message used to recover the abandoned cart. This message will be sent to customers that have consented to receive Facebook notifications from you.
infocons.msg3: After completing an order, send customers a Facebook message to inform them that you've received their order. The customers have to consent in order to be contacted via Facebook. In order to drive repeated sales from the contacted customers, you can consider adding a voucher code with a discount that they can apply to a future order on your shop.
infocons.msg4: After processing an order, send customers a Facebook message to inform them that you've shipped their order. The customers have to consent in order to be contacted via Facebook.
infocons.msg5: Quick Replies are possible reply variants that are offered to the user as part of your message. Feel free to customize the texts in your own language! There are 3 types of replies: "Sounds good" - the user can use this to let you know everything is fine. "I have more questions" - in this case, you should personally engage the user to clarify the questions related to the order. "Unsubscribe" - in this case, the user is not interested in purchasing and the app will not send any other messages.

carts1.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.

carts2.sendAfter: How much time should pass before sending this message.

ordrrcpt.hint1: You can use details from the order like {{first_name}}, {{last_name}} directly in the text. If you want to give the user an incentive to buy, create a coupon code <here> and add it here as text.
ordrrcpt.title: Title
ordrrcpt.subTitle: Subtitle

widgets.headerInfo: In order to send Facebook messages to your customers, they must first consent to be contacted via Facebook. The purpose of this widget is to enable your customers to offer that consent. If EU privacy laws apply to your company, it's recommended to select the Checkbox Consent widget. Feel free to customize the widget so that it matches the style of your website.
widgets.modalInfo: Customize the Consent Widget to match the style of your website.
widgets.modalText1: This is how your website will look like to your website visitors.
widgets.modalText2: Please note that this interface is for showcasing purposes and it's not clickable.
widgets.cnclInfo: If the customer does not want to offer the consent to be contacted via Facebook, then clicking this button will close the modal without offering it.
widgets.btnInfo: The customer will be able to click this button if the checkbox is checked. The button will submit the consent and close the modal.
widgets.chckBoxNote: *In order to use the checkbox plugin, you need to
widgets.chckBoxNoteHref: whitelist your site in the settings of your facebook page

fbCard1.tooltipText: Connect the Facebook page that will send messages to users. All the messages that the app provides will be sent by your Facebook page.Your personal details,including name will not be visible to message recipients
fbCard1.buttonFooter: If you don't have a facebook page, you can create one

fbCard2.info: Connect the Facebook page that will send messages to users. All the messages that the app provides will be sent by your Facebook page.Your personal details,including name will not be visible to message recipients
fbCard2.subheader: Choose the Facebook page that will be used to send messages to your users
fbCard2.dropdownSubText: The Facebook messages will be sent by the selected Page. Your name or other personal details will not be visible to users that receive your messages.

upgradeCard.body3: individual Facebook cart recovery attempts, with up to 2 messages per recovery attempt.
upgradeCard.body4: cart recovery attempts left this month.

accInfoCard.tooltipText: Add your contact information information. We will use your email to send you reports about app performance such as recovered sales.

tzCard.tooltipText: Add your timezone. All the displayed dates will be relative to the chosen timezone.
tzCard.label: Select Timezone
